name: Orbiter - Game 2
description:
Orbiter

A minimalist space strategy game where you try to take over the galaxy by
colonising planets, mining asteroids, and conquering your enemies.

How to play

Move ships - Left click to move ships from planet to planet (right click while selecting to send less ships) 

Camera - Drag to move camera, scroll wheel to zoom

See first level for a tutorial.

Project

This is game 2 of the "Make 10 games in 10 weeks" project by Paul from Paul Makes Games. Please leave me some feedback and check out my social media from the main menu or game description.

Follow the project

Twitter: https://twitter.com/PaulMakesGames
